name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with 10+ years of experience in leveraging **AI**, **ML**, and **deep learning** to deliver impactful software solutions, particularly in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** for deploying scalable cloud applications, utilizing **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Scikit-learn** for model development. Skilled in building and optimizing **MLOps** processes, from designing ML pipelines to managing production workflows with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Expert in developing **APIs** and utilizing **microservices** architecture for enhancing system performance. Adept at driving **automation** and supporting **digital transformation** initiatives, with a track record of improving business process efficiency through **business process optimization** strategies. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills, complemented by hands-on experience with **SQL**, **Apache Spark**, and **Hadoop** for data-driven decision-making.

Passionate about integrating **AI strategy**, focusing on **AI ethics** and **bias mitigation**. Brings a holistic approach to project management, leveraging tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** to ensure successful SDLC practices while meeting compliance standards.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions for healthcare and finance utilizing **TypeScript**, **Python (FastAPI)**, and **Node.js**, with modern frontends in **React (17–18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue 3**, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, PCI DSS, and SOX.
• Developed and deployed cross-platform mobile applications with **Flutter** and **React Native**, enhancing user experiences for healthcare and fintech products on both **iOS** and **Android**, while integrating native modules and managing state effectively with Provider and Redux.
• Spearheaded the transformation of monolithic applications into microservices-based architectures using **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless frameworks like **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, achieving high availability and fault tolerance.
• Established cloud-native data architecture with **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, specifically optimized for large-scale healthcare and financial data ingestion, storage, and querying, supporting over **1 million** records.
• Designed and deployed machine learning models addressing use cases such as patient risk prediction, financial fraud detection, and document classification using **Python (scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow)**, integrating real-time inference services into backend solutions, with models achieving an accuracy of **95%**.
• Constructed MLOps pipelines with **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow** for continuous training, validation, versioning, and deployment of models across development and production environments, handling over **10 ongoing projects** simultaneously.
• Integrated AI-driven features into client-facing applications, including smart financial dashboards, personalized health recommendations, and predictive alerts, powered by trained models and APIs hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
• Implemented enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, encapsulating linting, testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments for both web and API services, reducing deployment times by **30%**.
• Developed complex financial data visualization tools using **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating real-time insight into transaction trends, fraud detection, and operational KPIs, servicing **over 500 users**.
• Collaborated with data scientists to integrate NLP models (leveraging **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**) for healthcare document processing and financial anomaly detection, embedding them into core services via **RESTful APIs**.
• Established robust test strategies utilizing **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, encompassing unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing for both front-end and backend services, achieving a **100% test coverage** on critical components.
• Integrated **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** to furnish advanced search capabilities across millions of both unstructured and structured health records and financial documents.

• Spearheaded the digital transformation initiatives as a **Senior AI Engineer**, leveraging **AI** and **ML** to develop innovative solutions in a **microservices** architecture for financial services.
• Engineered comprehensive fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, successfully analyzing transaction patterns to proactively mitigate risk with a **95%** accuracy rate.
• Developed and integrated real-time analytics dashboards using **Power BI** and **D3.js**, allowing operations to monitor over **10,000** transactions daily while generating actionable insights with a **15%** improvement in response time.
• Designed and implemented robust ETL pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving **90%** efficiency in data ingestion from multiple sources.
• Integrated scalable, event-driven architectures through **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, supporting seamless communication and processing for fidelity in emergency alerts and compliance workflows, managing **50+** simultaneous events.
• Constructed dynamic front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, creating user interfaces that improved user engagement by **30%** by enhancing the performance and responsiveness of financial dashboards.
• Optimized back-end services utilizing **Python (FastAPI/Django)** to enhance transaction processing speeds by implementing **machine learning** models through **MLflow** for real-time decision-making.
• Championed the adoption of cloud technologies **(Azure)**, ensuring compliance and optimization of AI strategies for enterprise-wide deployment, conducting thorough bias mitigation and ethical AI practices.
• Managed all phases of the **SDLC** while utilizing **Jira** and **Confluence** for effective project management and communication, streamlining team collaboration and increasing delivery throughput by **20%**.

• Developed and optimized AI/ML solutions leveraging **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Scikit-learn**, resulting in personalized product recommendations that improved conversion rates by **20%**.
• Engineered scalable microservices architecture utilizing **Python** for backend services, achieving high availability and low latency in key e-commerce functionalities with an uptime of **99.9%**.
• Integrated advanced analytics and business intelligence tools such as **Tableau** and **Power BI** to visualize data insights, enhancing decision-making processes in product strategy and performance analysis.
• Collaborated on deployment processes using **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring a smooth transition of AI models into production environments while maintaining system robustness and security.
• Implemented data storage strategies utilizing **SQL** and distributed computing frameworks like **Apache Spark** and **Hadoop**, resulting in significant performance improvements with data processing speeds increased by **30%**.
• Spearheaded initiatives for digital transformation and business process optimization, introducing automation that streamlined workflows and reduced operational overhead by **25%**.
• Conducted comprehensive analysis and validation of AI models for ethical compliance, focusing on bias mitigation strategies in line with **AI ethics** guidelines.
• Led discussions and presentations on AI strategy and MLOps, actively engaging stakeholders to align technology initiatives with business goals and project management methodologies using **Jira** and **Confluence**.
• Developed RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless integration of machine learning components with existing systems, improving inter-departmental collaboration and data flow efficiency.

skills:
